titleStmt.title: The seven champions of Christendome Acted at the Cocke-pit, and at the Red-Bull in St. Iohns streete, with a generall liking. And never printed till this yeare 1638. Written by I.K.
titleStmt.author: Kirke, John, d. 1643.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. Okes, and are to be sold by Iames Becket at his shop in the Inner Temple Gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in the Inner Temple Gate
